titles.title: To eliminate the duties on Tetraamino Biphenyl.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 1/23/1996--Introduced. Directs the President to proclaim duty-free treatment of 3,3'- diaminobenzidine (Tetraamino Biphenyl) entered into the United States on or after January 1, 1995. Requires the Secretary of the Treasury to liquidate or reliquidate such entries, upon request, and to refund any duties paid.
